00027    /*
00028    * Constructor.
00029    */
00030    template <class SystemType>
00031    IntraBondTensorAutoCorr<SystemType>::IntraBondTensorAutoCorr(SystemType& system) 
00032     : SystemDiagnostic<SystemType>(system),
00033       outputFile_(),
00034       accumulator_(),
00035       speciesId_(-1),
00036       nMolecule_(-1),
00037       nBond_(-1),
00038       capacity_(-1),
00039       isInitialized_(false)
00040    {}
00041 
00042    /*
00043    * Destructor.
00044    */
00045    template <class SystemType>
00046    IntraBondTensorAutoCorr<SystemType>::~IntraBondTensorAutoCorr() 
00047    {}
00048 
00049    /*
00050    * Read parameters from file.
00051    */
00052    template <class SystemType>
00053    void IntraBondTensorAutoCorr<SystemType>::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00054    {
00055 
00056       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00057       readInterval(in);
00058       readOutputFileName(in);
00059 
00060       read(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00061       read(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00062 
00063       // Validate input
00064       if (speciesId_ < 0)       
00065          UTIL_THROW("Negative speciesId");
00066       if (speciesId_ >= system().simulation().nSpecies()) 
00067          UTIL_THROW("speciesId >= nSpecies");
00068       if (capacity_ <= 0)       
00069          UTIL_THROW("Negative capacity");
00070 
00071       speciesPtr_ = &system().simulation().species(speciesId_);
00072       nBond_ = speciesPtr_->nBond();
00073       if (nBond_ <= 0) UTIL_THROW("Number of bonds per molecule <= 0");
00074 
00075       // Allocate memory
00076       int speciesCapacity = speciesPtr_->capacity();
00077       if (speciesCapacity <= 0) UTIL_THROW("Species capacity <= 0");
00078       data_.allocate(speciesCapacity);
00079       accumulator_.setParam(speciesCapacity, capacity_);
00080 
00081       // Delay initialization of AutoCorrArray until first call
00082       // of sample(), when the number of molecules is known.
00083 
00084       isInitialized_ = true;
00085    }
00086 
00087    /*
00088    * Evaluate end-to-end vectors of all chains, add to ensemble.
00089    */
00090    template <class SystemType>
00091    void IntraBondTensorAutoCorr<SystemType>::setup() 
00092    { 
00093 
00094       if (!isInitialized_) {
00095          UTIL_THROW("Object is not intitialized");
00096       }
00097 
00098       // Get number of molecules and number of atoms per molecule.
00099       nMolecule_ = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00100       if (nMolecule_ <= 0) UTIL_THROW("nMolecule <= 0");
00101 
00102       // Initialize the AutoCorrArray object
00103       accumulator_.setNEnsemble(nMolecule_);
00104    }
00105 
00106    /*
00107    * Evaluate end-to-end vectors of all chains, add to ensemble.
00108    */
00109    template <class SystemType>
00110    void IntraBondTensorAutoCorr<SystemType>::sample(long iStep) 
00111    { 
00112       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00113 
00114          Tensor  t;
00115          Vector  dr, u;
00116          double  trace;
00117          int     i, j;
00118 
00119          // Confirm that nMolecule has remained constant
00120          if (nMolecule_ != system().nMolecule(speciesId_)) {
00121             UTIL_THROW("Number of molecules has changed.");
00122          }
00123 
00124          Boundary& boundary = system().boundary();
00125          System::ConstMoleculeIterator molIter;
00126          Molecule::ConstBondIterator   bondIter;
00127 
00128          // Loop over molecules
00129          i = 0;
00130          system().begin(speciesId_, molIter); 
00131          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++ molIter) {
00132             data_[i].zero();
00133 
00134             // Loop over bonds
00135             molIter->begin(bondIter);
00136             for ( ; bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00137                boundary.distanceSq(bondIter->atom(0).position(), 
00138                                    bondIter->atom(1).position(), dr);
00139                u.versor(dr);
00140                t.dyad(u, u);
00141                data_[i] += t;
00142             }
00143 
00144             // Remove trace
00145             trace  = data_[i].trace()/double(Dimension);
00146             for (j=0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00147                data_[i](j, j) -= trace;
00148             }
00149 
00150             ++i;
00151          }
00152 
00153          accumulator_.sample(data_);
00154 
00155       } // Is at interval
00156    }
00157 
00159    template <class SystemType>
00160    void IntraBondTensorAutoCorr<SystemType>::output() 
00161    {  
00162 
00163       // Echo parameters to diagnostic log file
00164       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(), outputFile_);
00165       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00166       outputFile_.close();
00167 
00168       // Output statistical analysis to separate data file
00169       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00170       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00171       outputFile_.close();
00172 
00173    }
00174 
00175 }
